content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
RISK-ON: Low volatility 14.8% with broad participation (breadth 7/8 sectors positive). Market favours cyclicals and banks on risk appetite and low realized vol.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Energy & Chemicals and Banking & Finance are leading; standouts include GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND and HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND. Broad-based gains across energy names and bank re-rating drive leadership.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Retail & Food is the lone laggard while Heavy Industry shows mixed internals; examples are ULKER (1W: -5.01% | 1M: +17.93%) CORRECTION and KONTR (1W: -3.96% | 1M: -18.16%) BELOW TREND. Watch retail for short-term profit-taking despite strong 1M performance.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND, OYAKC (1W: +7.81% | 1M: +12.67%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +7.36% | 1M: +15.18%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
ULKER (1W: -5.01% | 1M: +17.93%) CORRECTION, CCOLA (1W: -4.79% | 1M: +19.19%) CORRECTION, KONTR (1W: -3.96% | 1M: -18.16%) BELOW TREND, MGROS (1W: -3.23% | 1M: +16.60%) CORRECTION, BIMAS (1W: -2.86% | 1M: +13.86%) CORRECTION.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +7.19% | 1M: +10.79%) ABOVE TREND, SOKM (1W: +7.01% | 1M: +22.75%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banks are running with strong breadth; AKBNK (1W: +5.27% | 1M: +12.88%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +7.19% | 1M: +10.79%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND. Favor overweight exposure to rate-sensitive names while monitoring NIM and FX transmission.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy industry showing gains but with rotations; EREGL (1W: +3.84% | 1M: +12.00%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: -2.75% | 1M: +33.85%) CORRECTION, FROTO (1W: -0.28% | 1M: +10.11%) CORRECTION. Select names remain attractive after recent runs; watch order flow and margin signals.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Clear leadership with broad strength: TUPRS (1W: +1.48% | 1M: +20.11%) ABOVE TREND, GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND. Momentum and commodity re-pricing support further upside, but monitor oil and feedstock moves.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Risk-on stance: overweight Banking & Finance and Energy & Chemicals, selectively add cyclicals (autos, steel) and top quant names, underweight defensive Retail names showing short-term profit-taking. Keep hedges for FX/rate headlines and trim positions that lose their 1W momentum.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND, SOKM (1W: +7.01% | 1M: +22.75%) ABOVE TREND. These names are catalysts for sector flows and may lead further rotation.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Energy & Chemicals and Banking & Finance for continuation of the rally, and Retail & Food to monitor mean-reversion risk. Earnings, FX moves and local macro prints will drive intra-week sector shifts.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100 for confirmation of the breakout vs its recent high and hold of the short-term (1W) moving average as immediate support; a decisive close below the weekly MA would warn of rotation. Key triggers: TRY moves, CBRT commentary, CPI and corporate earnings/fund flows.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

Low volatility, broad participation: RISK-ON with Energy & Banking leading the rally and Retail showing short-term profit-taking. Trade with an overweight in cyclicals and banks, keep disciplined stops around weekly MAs given FX and rate sensitivities.
